title: Conduct a Warehouse Safety Inspection
description: A safety manager uses a checklist on a mobile device to conduct a weekly safety inspection of the warehouse.

tasks.description: Open the digital safety inspection checklist for the week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the correct safety checklist form.

tasks.description: Walk through the warehouse and mark each checklist item as 'Pass' or 'Fail'. For a 'Fail', take a photo of the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a blocked fire exit, marks it as 'Fail', and captures a photo.

tasks.description: Submit the completed checklist. The system automatically creates a corrective action task for the failed item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system logs the inspection and creates a task for the maintenance manager to clear the fire exit.
